mapper.select: select cinema_name_seq, theater_number from cinema_theater where 1=1 and cinema_name_seq = '${cinema_name_seq}'
SELECT DISTINCT a.seq, a.location_cinema_name, b.cinema_name_seq FROM cinema_name a JOIN cinema_theater b ON b.cinema_name_seq = a.seq WHERE a.delYN = 0;

select a.seq, a.start_time, a.date, a.delYN, b.movie_name, d.location_cinema_name, c.theater_number, c.cinema_type from running_time a join movie b on b.seq = a.movie_seq join cinema_theater c on c.seq = a.cinema_theater_seq join cinema_name d on d.seq = c.cinema_name_seq WHERE b.movie_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shKeyword},'%') AND d.location_cinema_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shKeyword2},'%') AND a.delYN = 0;
SELECT * FROM running_time WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}

select a.seq, a.start_time, a.date, a.delYN, b.movie_name, d.location_cinema_name, c.theater_number, c.cinema_type from running_time a join movie b on b.seq = a.movie_seq join cinema_theater c on c.seq = a.cinema_theater_seq join cinema_name d on d.seq = c.cinema_name_seq WHERE 1=1 AND a.seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE running_time a JOIN movie b ON b.seq = a.movie_seq JOIN cinema_theater c ON c.seq = a.cinema_theater_seq JOIN cinema_name d ON d.seq = c.cinema_name_seq SET a.start_time = #{start_time}, a.date = #{date}, b.movie_name = #{movie_name}, d.location_cinema_name = #{location_cinema_name}, c.theater_number = #{theater_number}, c.cinema_type = #{cinema_type} WHERE a.seq = #{seq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM running_time WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO running_time ( start_time, date, movie_seq, cinema_theater_seq, delYN ) VALUE ( #{start_time}, #{date}, #{movie_seq}, #{cinema_theater_seq}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE running_time SET delYN = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
